content:
We are excited to announce a working meeting hosted by the Pangeo community following the 2023 AMS Conference in Denver, CO. This event serves to bring together members of the Pangeo community to solve problems related to scientific research and programming.

When: Friday, January 13, 2023
Time: 9 AM - 4:30 PM MT
Where: mindSpark Learning (455 South Pierce St., Lakewood, CO 80226)

https://discourse.pangeo.io/t/post-ams-pangeo-working-meeting-january-13-2023-in-denver-co/2831
There are still a few spots open if people are interested (even though the deadline has passed): https://discourse.pangeo.io/t/post-ams-pangeo-working-meeting-january-13-2023-in-denver-co/2831
